DOC.brief_summary: Video-assisted thoracoscopic surgery ( VATS ) usually perform use well-collapsed lung essential optimum surgical visualization resection . However , one lung ventilation ( OLV ) associate deleterious impaired oxygenation secondary increase shunt fraction.1 There different approach recruitment non-dependent lung ( NL ) OLV selective application continuous positive pressure ventilation ( CPAP ) high frequency positive pressure ventilation ( HFPPV ) non-dependent lung.2-4 These strategy may improve arterial oxygenation reduce shunt fraction,2-4 However , use high CPAP level impaired surgical condition thoracotomy.2-3 On contrary , application HFPPV either lungs5or non-dependent lung permit adequate surgical condition thoracotomy.4 The investigator hypothesize application volume-controlled HFPPV non-dependent lung OLV video-assisted thoracoscopic surgery may provide good surgical field adequate oxygenation use CPAP 2 cm H2O . The investigator evaluate effect selective application conventional one lung ventilation , HFPPV , CPAP 2 cm H2O non-dependent lung surgical field condition , arterial oxygen carbon dioxide tension ( PaO2 PaCO2 , respectively ) OLV patient schedule video-assisted thoracoscopic surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Non-dependent HFPPV Versus CPAP Video-assisted Thoracoscopy
DOC.detailed_description: Thirty patient age 18-60 year ( ASA physical status II-III ) schedule elective video-assisted thoracoscopic surgery least one hour one-lung ventilation ( OLV ) include randomized prospective placebo-controlled crossover study author ' center obtain approval institutional ethical committee inform write consent . The patient randomize CPCP2-HFPPV group ( n = 15 ) HFPPV-CPAP2 group ( n = 15 ) . A power analysis data obtain preliminary pilot study indicate 26 patient sufficient detect one SD change visual analog scale assessment surgical field , type-I error 0.05 power 85 % , add 10 % patient , final sample size 30 patient account patient drop study . All operation perform surgeon . The patient premedicated fentanyl ( 1.0 μg/Kg ) i.v . midazolam ( 0.03 mg/Kg ) . All patient monitor five lead electrocardiography , pulse oximetry , non-invasive blood pressure 7mL/Kg 6 % Hydroxyethyl Starch 130/0.4 ( Voluven , Fresenius Kabi , Bad Homburg , Germany ) give intravenously induction general anesthesia . An arterial line ( 20 G ) insert local anesthesia . A thoracic epidural catheter ( T4-T7 ) insert patient sit position , test dose ( 1.5 % lidocaine 3 mL plus epinephrine 1:200.000 ) administer order exclude intravascular intrathecal position catheter . No epidural local anesthetic use study order avoid effect hypoxic pulmonary vasoconstriction . Anesthesiologists give anesthetic involved collection patient 's data . General anesthesia induce propofol ( 2-3 mg/kg ) , fentanyl ( 2-3 µg/kg ) , cisatracurium ( 0.2 mg/kg ) give muscle relaxation . The trachea intubate left-sided double-lumen tube ( DLT ) [ Broncho-Cath® ; Mallinckrodt Medical Ltd. , Dublin , Ireland ] . The correct position tube confirm fiberoptic bronchoscope intubation position patient lateral decubitus position . Other patient monitoring include end-tidal CO2 , neuromuscular blockade , nasopharyngeal temperature use . Anesthesia maintain continuous infusion propofol ( 6-8 mg/kg/h ) fentanyl ( 1 µg/kg/h ) . Increments cisatracurium ( 0.03 mg/kg ) give maintain suppression second twitch use train-of-four stimulation . In patient , patient ' two lung mechanically ventilate intermittent positive pressure ventilation use fraction inspire oxygen ( FiO2 ) 0.5 air , tidal volume ( VT ) 8 mL/kg ( predict body weight ) , inspiratory expiratory [ I : E ] ratio 1:2.5 , positive end-expiratory pressure ( PEEP ) 5 cm H2O , respiratory rate ( R.R ) adjust achieve arterial carbon dioxide tension ( PaCO2 ) 35-45 mm Hg , peak inspiratory pressure limit 35 cm H2O low flow fresh gas ( < 2 L/min ) semi close circuit system . After position patient lateral decubitus position , dependent non-operative lung ventilate conventionally ( OLV ) tidal volume 6 mL/kg ( predict body weight ) , whereas FiO2 , I : E ratio , PEEP , frequency , peak inspiratory pressure , flow fresh gas maintain two-lung ventilation lumen non-dependent operative lung leave open air . The subject allocate randomly two group ( n=15 ) draw sequentially number seal opaque envelope contain computer-generated randomization code . In CPAP2-HFPPV group , non-dependent lung allow deflate CPAP 2 cm H2O 30 min , use CPAP circuit ( Bronchocath® CPAP system ; Mallinckrodt Medical , Inc. , St. Louis , MO ) connect flowmeter oxygen cylinder flow rate 5 L/min FiO2 1.0.7 Then , lumen non-dependent lung connect second identical ventilator low compliant internal circuit . HFPPV initiate 30 min use FiO2 1.0 , VT 3 mL/kg ( predict body weight ) , I : E ratio < 0.3 R.R 60 breaths/min . In HFPPV-CPAP2 group , non-dependent lung ventilate use HFPPV non-dependent lung 30 min follow non-dependent lung CPAP 2 cm H2O 30 min , At end surgery , nondependent lung re-expanded two-lung ventilation resume tidal volume 8 mL/kg ( predict body weight ) . Twenty minute skin closure , infusion propofol fentanyl gradually decrease 20 % every 5 minute . At end surgery , infusion discontinue , residual neuromuscular block antagonize neostigmine 50 μg/kg atropine 20 μg/kg , patient extubated anesthesiologist . The surgical field condition , oxygenation hemodynamic data record induction general anesthesia ( baseline ) , 15 ( NL-15 ) , 30 ( NL-30 ) 60 minute ( NL-60 ) selective application CPAP HFPV nondependent lung , 15 min return two-lung ventilation ( TLV ) . The surgeon ask rate satisfaction surgical field use 10-cm VAS ( 0 : worse ; 10 : excellent field ) . The ICU hospital lengths-of-stay record . Perioperative hypoxemia ( SaO2 < 90 % ) , respiratory cardiovascular event , mortality record within 30 day surgery short period may miss complication death directly related event occur thoracic surgery . Statistical analysis perform use Statistical Package Social Sciences ( Release 16 , SPSS Inc. , Chicago , IL , 2007 ) . Data test normality use Kolmogorov-Smirnov test . Repeated-measures analysis variance use analysis serial change patient ' data different time start study intervention . Chi-square test use categorical data . Dependent t-test ANOVA use continuous parametric variable . The Mann-Whitney U test perform intergroup comparison non-parametric value . Data express mean ( SD ) , number ( % ) , median [ range ] . A value P < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
DOC.criteria: elective videoassisted thoracoscopic surgery least one hour onelung ventilation ( OLV ) decompensated cardiac disease ( > New York Heart Association II ) pulmonary disease ( vital capacity FEV1 % < 50 % predicted value ) hepatic disease renal disease arrhythmias pulmonary hypertension ( mean pulmonary artery pressure > 30 mm Hg ) previous history pneumonectomy bilobectomy lobectomy
